u/The_RumHam is a great steamer and also very knowledgeable. I wish he would stream more!!
Agreed
Agreed
Ah no worries, I really appreciate the effort
Wouldn't be the first time they turned a card from utter crap to really good (skarmy)
I love the concept behind this deck. Have you considered recording some replays?
Win trading. Just look around this sub lots of threads with proof about it
It's not too hard to believe considering their tactics...
Disgustingly good!
You clearly missed the entire point of why he BM'ed
It's also gotten much easier to counter too because poison is a lesser problem.

You can definitely go head to head with a giant. If you see their giant appear behind on their side, prep your golem, his slower deploy and speed will cause the fight to happen on your side. Murder the giant with your golem support troops while your golem tanks theirs. Your golem will out last their giant and depending how fast you kill the giant you'll have a massive golem (or golemite) supported push. This works best with inferno dragon, but a LJ, mini p, any fast giant slayer will work. Try skarmy, they can't all be zapped if you surround a giant.
LH tanks to the tower, ice golem walks behind, once the pups come out the IG is tanking. Bonus you get to use the IG on defense if needed

Drop all the expensive cards except for 3M. I have 3 elixir or lower cards in my quick cycle deck and I don't miss the pump one bit.
Edit: forgot I was using fireball.
You must be in the lower arena depths, that shit doesn't work where I'm from.
I'm using ice golem, knight and miner to tank in my 3M quick cycle, haven't missed the pump.
Log is falic
Shameless plug! But I really do agree with your statement.
Yeah really, there's some arenas with no grass!!
Princess, spear gobs, zap or collector. I used to run it with collector but found log to offer more utility.
Nothing, the assumption is the reduction of poison use may increase the use of freeze and rage. The original trifecta deck used freeze but migrated to poison when it became popular.

I use miner, spear gobs, ice spirit, mega minion, guards, inferno, log and poison. Will probably revise poison with the update. Deck was great for preying on the giant poison meta. Swap in princess for spear gobs if you like.
Spear goblins!
Have any videos to share? I just tried it with ice spirit instead of fire spirits and it was pretty fun. What's your reasoning for fire spirits over ice?
You'd use both cards in a zap bait anyways
Here comes the miner control cancer
It's just a more efficient zap/log/arrow bait. The potential downfall of poison and rise of freeze and rage may help skarmy too
Log was already OP if you know how to use it. This just makes it even better.

All great changes. I'm glad I stayed away from giant poison decks. Definitely liking the log love.
The ice golem and golem interactions are great too

WRITING.TITLE: RIP Goison, new balance updates incoming

WRITING.TEXT: This is a bug and you shouldn't rely on it. It'll only help 1 unit, 1 out of 3 musketeers for example. Also it doesn't always work as planned.

Also I wish pcats was on this list. Chaaaaaat!!! I can rarely catch his live streams on twitch, so I watch his YouTube uploads almost every day.

Mine giving a little strategy behind this? I've got a level 2 LJ collecting dust.
Thanks, great watch. Seems like fast cycle is your biggest nemesis but you still got a win against a couple of them.

Awesome write up! Some replay footage would be really appreciated if you can provide it. Thanks!

The inferno dragon is only good with a tank in front. I've had the most success with a golem deck and dragon.

Thanks for the detailed reply! I'm going to test this out. Seems like it would be really fun to master. If you have any footage it would be greatly appreciated.

Holy shit what a feature!
Oh man this looks like so much fun. Mind sharing some strategy details?
The problem is to be competitive you have to use this deck and there's only small room for variation. That being said something like Mikan's anti meta would thrive on this scenario.
He's a star in Ash's golem inferno dragon deck. Very fun to play. I'm having great success at 3500

WRITING.TITLE: [BUG] Small notification bug when Legendary Chest is unlocked

WRITING.TEXT: I found Mike Ross

Meh don't really care. Pcats is still one of the most entertaining steamers.
Chaaaaaat!
There's a lot of awesome things us Canadians do that we don't know about. Which I could share some...
The log buff is amazing. I only roll with log as my spell in a 3M deck at 3400. Stopping Prince charges, knocking away giants and RG to retarget or delay them is fantastic too.
I need to be informed
Where does Reddit Legends fit into this?

Giant chests and magical chests love shitting out rockets mortars and xbow cards. My rocket is 9, I've got enough cards for level 12 mortar and my xbow is half way to 5. I'll try experimenting with either variation of miner or rocket. Thanks for the reply

Thanks so much for this write up. I was using another quick cycle mortar deck last week, it had a decent win rate but your deck is much more fun thanks to the miner. It gives it a little more flexibility and the opportunity to catch someone off guard on a counter. I also had to finish someone off with log miner chip twice lol
How critical is the level 2 miner? My rocket is level 9, would you recommend that over a level 1 miner for ladder play? So far I've dominated 2 tournaments with miner.
I'd love to see high ladder replays!
The challenge was set! Please tell me there was a beatdown
Probably one of the best legendaries, no joke
No but learning how to use it properly makes you a better player.
All hail Log God

You don't build a deck around log. You sub it in for something and benefit from good elixir trades. For example in my 3M deck it's my only spell. I was using fireball, but subbed it out for log and I don't miss FB at all. I use ice wizard, fire spirits and 3M to handle anything in the air.
Another deck would be a hog rocket log combo, that again has maybe fire spirits, ice spirit or ice wiz to handle air, specifically minion horde. Try it out and see what works and what doesn't. It's biggest downfall is the inability to handle minion hordes, but the utility it brings over zap is amazing.
Did you even watch the video in the OP??
What did you get?
Anyone who shits on the log doesn't have a good handle on this game yet.
lol I'd love to try this

Congrats on your achievement. What are your thoughts on replacing skeletons with either stabby gobs or log? I'm huge fan of log and its many users. I feel like it could do well. It seems like the skeletons primary function is to just be a cheap cycle. Also my stabby gobs are 11 while skeletons are level 8.
Knight can also soak up 2 hits of he's not killed off by something else after the first shot

I think they should just allow xbow to attack air and reduce its air range like in CoC. Leave the ground interaction the same. This would also give hound decks the ability to counter xbow siege by tanking the shots.
Have you considered using a goblin barrel and if so what would you swap out? Sparky is just too good of a zap bait to not use another card that's susceptible to zap.
See a giant or bowler drop behind their tower? Introduce them to your pekka and win.
Which takes some skill to play...
Mind sharing more details about his deck?
Because there's nothing out of the ordinary in the image. But if he posted a level 1 vs 9 maybe we'd be more impressed.
I pulled my miner from a 4 card tourney chest. Congrats on your LJ, I got 2 from separate crown chests.
Looking at what was going on, he probably just gave up and tossed it sideways. I do this frequently when I know I've lost.

And vice versa x bow will be at the mercy of air decks since they're probably going to become very popular. I think all it needs is the ability at attack air but at a shortened range. Similar to how it works in CoC
I dunno, I find knight offers so much more utility for 1 extra elixir. I can't run my 3M deck without it. Plus it's a common card
The musketeer in almost all my decks would like to have a word with you.
